Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest

Other Income (Expense): disposal group not discontinued operation gain loss on disposal

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation net of tax per basic share
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
